text:
A path known to cause isses with loading certs is:
C:\testüö

If Tomcat is installed in theis location then the certs fail to load from the conf directory.
creator: markt@apache.org
mturk@apache.org
text: I don't think OpenSSL supports UTF encoding for file system. It uses simple fopen which is OEM encoded (for Windows). We would probably need some custom encoder from UTF to OEM which I think is just too much for the few edge case.
